# Wikidotrb API Documentation

This document provides detailed information about the Wikidotrb API, a Ruby library for interacting with Wikidot sites.

# Wikidotrb
Source: /Wikidotrb.html

Wikidotrb - Ruby library for interacting with Wikidot sites
This library provides a set of tools to interact with Wikidot sites through their
AJAX Module Connector (AMC) interface. It allows for tasks such as:
* Logging in and managing authentication
* Reading and editing pages
* Managing forum discussions
* Working with user accounts
* Interacting with site settings
For getting started, see {Wikidotrb::Module::Client} which is the main entry point.

No methods found.

# Wikidotrb::Module::Site
Source: /Wikidotrb/Module/Site.html

No documentation available.

## Methods

### amc_request

Execute an AMC request for this site

### from_unix_name

Get a site object by its UNIX name

### get_applications

Get pending membership applications for the site

### get_url

Get the site URL

### initialize

No documentation available.

### invite_user

Invite a user to the site

### login_required

No documentation available.

### to_s

No documentation available.


# Wikidotrb::Module::User

Regular user object

## Methods

### from_name
